about_the_game:
You're dangerous, that's why everyone want you gone...

Synopsis:

In a future not so far, after a failed Alien invasion attempt, environmental pollution and chemicals created a brand-new human species, the "Chimeras", who are able to use supernatural capabilities but are accused to contaminate the rest of the Humanity with various diseases.

The crisis got partially resolved by building a gigantic rampart as long as the Maginot Line to separate the "Normals" and the "Chimera", called "The Wall Fortress".

You play as the Captain Flint, an antipathetic special-force officer who use any way to accomplish a mission. Called on a Pro-Chimera Protest who is turning into a murderous riot, you will receive an order who will end your career and turn you into the Most Wanted person in the Country...

But will you rise again from despair and take back what they took from you?



Sneaking is a Question but Violence is your only answer.

-Gameplay:
Not an "Usual RPGMaker Game" like we always see.
You're not the Chosen One, you're not the World Savior.
No Heroes, No Villains, only peoples with different values, morals and ethics.

-3D Printing machine goes BRRRRRRRR :
Focused on random loot generation for Weapons and Armors. Keep shooting to earn big shooters and big numbers. Loots an unlimited number of weapons, from Handguns to Sniper rifle, including Assault Rifle and even Flintlock Rifle.

-The future is now, Old Magus :
Who need magic when you can use guns, grenades or your Chimera Powers. Swords are "has-been" but manufacturers are still making some, next-gen samurais are still having some fun!

-Sneaking and Infiltration Mechanism:
Enemies are roaming around, keep hiding behind props and walls to remain unseen. Discretion is your best friend out there and if they notice your presence, you're going to have to fight for your life.

-Build a militia, or a Nation:
In the middle of the desert, an Borealian abandoned military base in ruins is waiting for you.
Recruit new members in your team.
Collect resources to repair the building, prepare defense to turn the base into a powerful Fortress.
Restore, repair and research technologies to improve your team.
